The author can be contacted via e-mail at fabrizio.ge@tiscalinet.it

If you have trouble using the program, and want to ask for help, go to the Sourceforge page, then go to Forums and post a message to the Help forum

If you want to suggest a new feature or bug fix, go to the Sourceforge page, then go to Feature requests and click on Submit new

If you wrote a modification to the program and want to submit it for inclusion, first create a patch to be applied to the source code (use the diff utility to create it), then go to the Sourceforge page, then to Patches and click on Submit new
